Articles.Content:
If you thought i stole this from roblox, you're absolutely right.

So, a user picks a team, a class and an action. Up to 3 actions per post, and only 1 class-team per post, please.

I, the creator of the thread, decide when we have a new map, and the gamemode. Fictional maps/teams/classes/actions may be used.

Attention Moderators: Please do not select a class called moderator. It breaks the rules. Thank you!

Example:

User 1: BLU engineer: construct sentry nest.

User 2: RED Spy: Attempt to sap said sentry nest.

User 1: BLU engineer: Kill above spy.

I will begin. The map is ctf_2fort, and the gamemode is Capture the flag.

RED Engineer: Construct engineer nest in intelligence room.

Edited July 16, 2014 by Souper
BLUE Chell: Creates a portal into the engineer nest. Drops a Heavy through the portal.
GREY Demobot: Plant bombs around the sewer entrance to the RED and BLU bases. Proceeds to use large sword to camp both sides.
RED Pyro: Airblast the stickies back into the GREY Demobot.

BLU Spy: Prepare to backstab a random RED class.

Edited July 17, 2014 by Souper
Everything Blackhole - Destroys everything, thus ceasing the game.
Everything Whitehole: Creates everything, thus the game continues.
Moderator: Locks the thread and directs everyone to play.kerbalroleplay.com. Reminds OP that he doesn't make the rules.
